name: eceq2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c0, c2))

comment: Equality theorem for the ` A ` -coset and ` B ` -coset of ` C ` , inference version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 11-May-2021.)
